description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It's Christmas Eve, and Santa needs to deliver all his gifts.  Fly his sleigh through the air, dodging trees, church steeples, geese and even helicopters, all while slinging gifts to happy boys and girls!
description.short: It's Christmas Eve, and Santa needs to deliver all his gifts.  Fly his sleigh through the air, dodging trees, church steeples, geese and even helicopters, all while slinging gifts to happy boys and girls!
